meanings.definition: A device used to restore energy to a battery or power source.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my recharger with me to keep my phone powered up.
meanings.sent2: The recharger plugged into the wall to revive the dead battery.
meanings.sent3: The recharger looked like a tiny robot feeding energy to my phone.
meanings.sent4: The recharger hummed softly as it brought life back to the drained battery.
meanings.sent5: Using the recharger felt like giving my phone a refreshing drink of energy.

meanings.definition: A person who replenishes or refills something with energy or power.
meanings.sent1: My dad is the recharger of our family, always fixing things that run out of power.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was the recharger for my car, making it run smoothly again.
meanings.sent3: The recharger at the office is like a superhero, saving our devices from exhaustion.
meanings.sent4: She was the recharger of positivity in our group, always lifting our spirits.
meanings.sent5: The recharger of the flashlight made sure it never dimmed during our camping trip.
